scripts.validate-env: node -e "import('dotenv').then(dotenv => { dotenv.config(); const required = ['VITE_COGNITO_USER_POOL_ID', 'VITE_COGNITO_CLIENT_ID']; const missing = required.filter(key => !process.env[key]); if (missing.length > 0) { console.error('❌ Missing environment variables:', missing); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ All environment variables are set'); } })"
